name: marreta
description: Marreta is a self-hosted tool for managing password backups as encrypted files. Itâ€™s designed for simple offline storage and retrieval of credentials in a secure manner, accessible via a minimal UI.
features: Encrypted storage: Store passwords and credentials in encrypted files for secure offline access.
Backup management: Create and manage multiple encrypted backup files of your password database.
Simple interface: Minimal web UI for adding, editing, and retrieving stored credentials.
Master password: Single master password protects all stored credentials with strong encryption.
Export functionality: Download encrypted backup files for storage on external media or cloud.
Import capability: Restore credentials from previously exported encrypted backup files.
Search function: Quickly find specific credentials by service name or username.
Category organization: Group passwords by category like work, personal, or financial.
Password generator: Create strong random passwords with customizable length and complexity.
Offline access: Access your password vault without internet connection after initial setup.
No dependencies: Self-contained solution with minimal external dependencies for reliability.
Audit log: Track when credentials were accessed or modified for security monitoring.
